verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm here with the others who saw the heavens testify.
Now I hang back in the shadows; I want to come close, I want to know.
She sees me shivering here, she smiles and with a nod,
I walk through the mud and straw
to the newborn Son of God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He raises a wrinkled hand through the dust and the flies.
Wrapped in rags like we are
and with barely open eyes, He takes my finger
And He won't let go, and he won't let go.
It's nothing like I knew before, and it's all I need to know.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Come let us adore Him; He has
come down to this barren land
Where we live,
And all I have to give Him
is Adoration.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
God is with us here,
Our Immanuel.
God is with us here,
Our Immanuel.
